name: Ice Doll Mirror
effectText: Send 1 WATER monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck with the same name as 1 WATER monster you control, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except WATER monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Ice Doll" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ice Doll Mirror" once per turn.
